question: In zygote intrafallopian tube transfer, the embryo upto ____ stage is transferred into the fallopian tube
explanation: In ZIFT (Zygote Intra Fallopian Transfer), the zygote or early embryo with up to 8 blastomeres is transferred into the fallopian tube. Embryos with more than 8 blastomeres are transferred into the uterus (IUT).
